logfields.transactionId: this is the transaction id of the log message
logfields.timestamp: this is the timestamp of the log message
logfields.message: this is the message of the log
logfields.app: this is the app name that the log message came from
logfields.dc: this is the datacenter that the app is running in
logfields.file: this is the file that the log message was logged from
logfields.group: this is the group that the app is a part of
logfields.host_ip: this is the ip address of the host that the app is running on
logfields.level: this is the level of the log message which can be INFO, WARNING, ERROR, DEBUG, CRITICAL, etc.
logfields.pname: this is the pname that the app is running on
logfields.time: this is the time that the log message was logged
